entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to compile my .net core app using build #21498
    Discussion

Closed

  • Targeting pack "path" is in consistent #12098
    6.0.1xx
  • Clean up and refactoring ProcessFrameworkReferences #12117
    6.0.1xx
  • .NET 5: Unable to install some .NET tools (dotnet tool install) #14547
    Backlog
  • Remove workaround for pinning AssemblyVersion for templatelocator #14801
    6.0.1xx
  • [ARM32]With .NET 6 Preview1, running application failed with error required library libhostfxr.so could not be found. #15757
    6.0.1xx
  • Publish of WPF app fails for ARM64 - "There was no runtime pack" #15972
  • VS 16.10 build regression - MSB4023: Cannot evaluate the item metadata "%(FullPath)". #17938
    6.0.1xx
  • dotnet publish hangs on Linux build #18484
  • [Loc]the output about help description in CLI are unlocalized on locale OS. #18934
  • [Daily SDK build] Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildSdkResolver breaks VS2019 and VS2022 when trying to load any projects. #19015
    6.0.1xx
  • "dotnet workload update --print-download-link-only" command fails #19691
  • `dotnet --help` and `dotnet help` don't list `dotnet workload` commands #21463

PullRequests

Created

  • Add OS and Process Architecture #21517
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1391668 #21516
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1391498 #21514
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1391342 #21509
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Razor] Fixes pack incrementalism issue #21506
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate.source-build dependency #21505
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21487
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove sql-cache from dotnet help #21464
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Rename DeploymentReleasesVersion Versions.props entry. #21502
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Clean up client/server shutdown #21390
    Area-Workloads
  • [Backport][Blazor] from main: BlazorWasm: Fix including the target assembly #21453
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21422
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix failure when manifest that is expected to exist isn't found #21358
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #21199
    Area-Infrastructure
